Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>?
Oh, so you won, did you?
<PAGE>
No need to come and tell me...
I was there and already know.
<PAGE>
So, is there something else?
Want a pat on the back?
How about I just say congrats?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey.
You did pretty good out there.
<PAGE>
What are you grinning about?
You look happy as a dog with a bone.
Winning makes you this goofy?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you won the advanced class.
I like people who work hard.
I really mean it. I think you did great.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I guess since you worked so
hard, I should give you a reward.
How about I let you ask me on a date?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Maybe not a reward, as such...
But I know you are feeling overcome
by the attractiveness of my offer.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good job, <MYNAME>.
I knew you would win.
Hmm? How did I know?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Because I know that my love
couldn't possibly lose.
You ask about such obvious things.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Don't run around grinning like a fool
just because you won this time.
The other guys are watching, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>What? Jealous? Me?
You must be crazy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You are my girlfriend after all
just be nice and listen to what I say.
If you understand, where is your answer?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That's more like it, good girl.
You are only allowed to smile
like that for me, do you understand.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am sure that you, had no problem
at all winning in that class.
<PAGE>
You should totally try your hand
at a tougher class.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>My lady is all kinds of meek.
But that's what I like about her.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your win.
I was watching you know, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
What? My staring threw you off and you
couldn't concentrate on the festival?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That's kind of a mean thing to say.
I watch you every day you know.
That is what people who are engaged do.
<PAGE>
I guess my woman is going to stay
clueless even after we get hitched.
But it's ok, I like that kind of thing.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So you won the advanced class.
Only to be expected from my woman.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Maybe as a present I can serve you
for a change, how would you like that? 
So, what do you want me to do?
<PAGE>
Should I make some dinner?
Or maybe help out with the work?
You can ask me to do anything you like.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You lost? Oh well...
What about it? What do you 
want me to say, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
A guy like me does not pat others
on the back and say "too bad."
Don't look for that kind of thing here.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think, maybe, that
it is alright to lose sometimes?
<PAGE>
If you win all of the time,
it could get boring.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Just because you lost,
don't go moping around all day.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Don't you know that seeing you depressed
makes me...uncomfortable?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad about not winning, <MYNAME>.
But then you are still cute
even when you are down and feeling blue.
<PAGE>
But if you ask me, I like it best
when you are smiling, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
So I expect you to win big next time
and show me your best happy face.
That is not a suggestion, it's an order.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad you didn't win, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
How about today I will be nice to you
and help to cheer you up for a
change?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Why the long face?
Is it so bad, not winning
this time?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You really shouldn't
get so down just because you lost.
Besides...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When you make that face,
it makes me want to tease you.
What do you mean I'm a bad person? 
<PAGE>
If you don't like to be teased for being
sad, then maybe you should
smile and laugh like you normally do.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't expect me to cheer you up?
You didn't lose this time did you?
Not my lady!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I'm right, aren't I?
I will bet you that I am right.
Let's just leave it here.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What, were you sick today or something?
I don't think it's impossible at all
for you to win...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I am not trying to be mean or anything.
I'm not the type who would tease his
lady if she wasn't feeling good.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even if you lose a hundred times,
I am not going to leave you.
No matter what. So don't worry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You're surprised? I would never do that.
After all you're the most precious thing
in the world to me, my lovely lady.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think that if you were the type who
didn't like vegetables, this festival
would be the worst thing in the world.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Toni has been bawling from the start,
and it is starting to get on my nerves.
<PAGE>
He should eat up and get it over with.
Oh, I'm just kidding.
Don't get all upset now.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think if you were the type who
didn't like vegetables, this festival
would be the worst thing in the world.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Toni has been bawling from the start
and it is starting to get on my nerves.
<PAGE>
He should eat up and get it over with.
Oh, I'm just kidding.
Don't get all upset now.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When did you start raising the fruit
that you put out this time, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Doesn't it usually take a
long time from when you plant a fruit
tree until it starts bearing fruit?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have to hand it to you,
putting in all of that time and effort,
I really respect you for it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like it when it's hot, but I do
like to see the flowers and herbs.
<PAGE>
I love to put pretty flowers and nice 
smelling herbs in my shop.
A bit of a pain but worth it.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fruits and vegetables are all right,
but I like flowers and herbs, too.
<PAGE>
With some nice smelling herbs and 
pretty flowers, I could really liven up 
the shop. It won't be too hard, I think.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think Emma is a really amazing girl.
She can judge things really well
and is really great.
<PAGE>
She is so amazing, sometimes I think
maybe I should have married her myself.
Not really, just saying is all.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think Emma is a really amazing girl.
She can judge things really well
and is really great.
<PAGE>
She is so amazing, sometimes I think
maybe I should have married her myself.
Not really, just saying is all.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Girls like fruits and sweet things.
They like to eat sweets and 
really enjoy the flavors.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But, then again
some girls like fruits but not 
really sweet deserts... Go figure.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When it comes to the whims of women they
are as deep and changeable as the sea.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congrats
on winning the beginner's class!
<PAGE>
I think you have real skills, <MYNAME>
and should definitely try the 
higher classes next time!
<PAGE>
I will be cheering you on!
So, good luck!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congrats on your intermediate class win!
You are really amazing, <MYNAME>.
Really, really amazing!
<PAGE>
I still have a lot to
learn from you, I think!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That is super amazing that you
won in the advanced class!
<PAGE>
Next you should aim for the repeat win!
Good luck on your next victory!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, congrats
on winning the beginner's class!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>What a big win for my lovely girlfriend.
I am as happy for you as
if I had won it myself!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>!
Congrats on your intermediate class win!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>When I see you working hard, <MYNAME>,
it inspires me to go out
and work even harder too.
<PAGE>
After all, if we're going out,
I have to be the kind of guy that 
is worthy of you!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, congrats on the advanced class win.
You think my enthusiasm has gone down?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Well...actually...
I am really glad that you won, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But...that means that now
you will be really popular, <MYNAME>.
And that is kind of getting me down.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I mean, if you are super popular,
you will belong to everyone, right?
But you are my girlfriend, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>!
When we get home, let's celebrate.
<PAGE>
What would you like for dinner?
I will make your favorites, <MYNAME>.
Would you like that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Don't hold back!
I think you should take this special
day to celebrate and not to work more.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations <MYNAME>!
I always knew that
you had it in you to win.
<PAGE>
I mean, I see you working so hard
every day <MYNAME>.
I am there with you, so I know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But sometimes I do worry that
you work too hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>We are married after all.
You should let me help out sometimes.
We are in this together.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>
congratulations on your win!
<PAGE>
Sometimes I pinch myself. It's like a 
dream, having such a wonderful wife.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I am so happy that I could marry you, <MYNAME>.
I'm the happiest guy in the whole world.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad about this time. But I know
that you really tried hard, <MYNAME>.
You will win next time for sure!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry.
Too bad that you didn't win this time...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But I think that you
are a champ just for trying today.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, it is the advanced class...
That class is full of strong contenders.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I am sure that you
can win next time, <MYNAME>!
You just have to keep trying!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, too bad about today.
I know you didn't win this time
but there is always next time!
<PAGE>
So, please don't be upset!
<PAGE>
When I see you sad like this <MYNAME>
it makes me sad too.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Too bad about today...
I really thought that you would
win today, for sure, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I wonder...
What do you think went wrong today?
<PAGE>
I know. We should go together
to ask Emma. She will tell
you exactly what to work on!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>.
Too bad you didn't win today...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But, well...um...
Sorry, I can never find the right words
to make people feel good...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wish I could say something
really funny to make you smile, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Sorry that I'm not a better boyfriend...
I will find some good jokes for 
next time so just wait a bit, alright?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Sorry you didn't win.
It really is too bad about today...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Hey, I know!
How about I make a super amazing dinner
tonight that will cheer you right up!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad about today, <MYNAME>.
I'll bet you are really tired about now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Let's have some nice tea when
we get home and you can relax.
<PAGE>
Then we can think together about
how you can win next time!
I am your husband, I want to help out!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Too bad that you didn't win this time.
I bet it was because you just weren't
feeling at the top of your game today!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know how hard you work, <MYNAME>.
I know better than anyone else.
Let's go home and take a break!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! Let's hold hands
and walk home together.
You shouldn't be embarrassed by that.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, did you see it <MYNAME>?
Neil was making a really
grossed out face earlier.
<PAGE>
I wonder if there was something someone
put out that he really didn't like?
<PAGE>
He looks normal but really there are a
lot of things he likes and doesn't like.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mushrooms are really weird looking.
I think anyone who tries them is
really amazing and brave.
<PAGE>
When I first saw how weird they looked
I admit I didn't have the courage
to try them myself...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It takes a really long time
to grow fruit, right?
<PAGE>
If you spend so much time and invest
that much energy in growing them...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Most people must appreciate
getting fruit as a present, I think.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even in this heat you
really grew some amazing things.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I think it is amazing the power of
living things to grow no matter what.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But you have to be careful about plants;
They don't like it when it's too hot.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The flowers are very pretty. Then you
get close and they smell good too.
<PAGE>
When I am in a field of flowers
the air is about as sweet as it can get.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What fruits are you planning on showing
for the winter festival?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I am really interested because
whatever you show is always really 
delicious looking!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you use the rice patties to
grow lots <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I think it is really tough
to grow things in the rice patties but
it does look like it would be fun.
<PAGE>
If you could, can you show me
how to do it next time?!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>.
I never really imagined that you could
grow very much in the winter time...
<PAGE>
What grows in the winter?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Wow, I can't believe there are so many
things to grow in the winter!
You are really smart, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
Go for the intermediate class next time?
<PAGE>
Even if you don't win you really
should try as many new things as 
you can while you are still young.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You are really something, <MYNAME>.
Congratulations!
<PAGE>
You gave me a really great show.
I look forward to next time.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hi, <MYNAME>.
I can't believe that you
won in the advanced class.
<PAGE>
Looks like you are top of the heap now.
It is good to be young.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Looked like you had an easy time of
it too. Or was that just my imagination?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Not like I'm your boyfriend or anything.
When I see something, I see it honestly.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.
It is really amazing that you won.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I was so happy,
it was almost as good as winning myself.
I mean that from the bottom of my heart.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>.
Congratulations on winning.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I always enjoy the festivals
where you show your produce.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What? What do you think I meant?
I didn't mean anything bad.
I was just trying to give a compliment.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I could watch you
out working hard all day, every day
and never get tired of the sight, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your win, <MYNAME>.
If you have time how about a few words.
<PAGE>
If I wasn't here to relax, I would 
write an article about you, <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
Well, even if I wrote something 
I think I might be a bit biased now.
Probably best not to write anything.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations <MYNAME>.
You are really amazing, you know that, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Alright, come over here.
Let me give you a pat on the head!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You are really something,
winning the advanced class.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You are so amazing sometimes.
I wonder at my luck to be married to
such a wonderful girl like you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I have to work harder too,
so you will notice...
Notice what, you ask? That's a secret.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I am sorry you didn't win today.
But there is always next time!
Only when you give up is it truly over.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even if you didn't win this time,
I bet you still learned a lot.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Just kidding.
Did I sound all wise and kind
just then? I'm trying something new.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry you didn't win, <MYNAME>.
Everyone in the advanced class is
really strong and brings their A game.
<PAGE>
I have seen every one of the contestants
in the magazines. They are all famous.
What a surprise competition like that!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There, there...
What? You sure don't look
very sad, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>And I was trying really hard
to be all nice and everything. It's not
nice to be happy when I comfort you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>After all, I am your boyfriend
right, <MYNAME>?
That is what boyfriends do, right?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You didn't win today but
you have to think of next time now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know! I will 
look for a book on secrets to winning
for you to use next time.
<PAGE>
I have to do
my part to help you win, <MYNAME>.
I will show you how helpful I can be!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry you didn't win, <MYNAME>.
I know you tried really hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You may have lost this time
but I know you, <MYNAME>. You will
keep working hard and win next time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I mean look at who you were
up against in the advanced class.
Everyone was really amazing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So don't worry that you 
lost this time around. Be happy!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I guess everyone
loses sometimes.
No use getting sad about such things.
<PAGE>
How about we stop somewhere
on the way home to cheer you up?
I will go with you; it will be fun.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, yeah.
You really tried hard, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It is alright, I understand.
You weren't feeling your best today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Well, let's go home then.
We should go home and take it easy.
You forget the bad things the quickest.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey...
Looks like you're down in the dumps.
<PAGE>
You can't go around crying just
because of one little loss.
<PAGE>
I would get sad too if you
cried, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Alright, there, there...
I'll be extra nice to you at home.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It really is too bad that so many
people these days don't like vegetables.
<PAGE>
You look around the festival and this
guy and that guy make terrible faces 
when the vegetables are brought out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Do you eat your vegetables?
You can't just make them and sell them.
Eat them too, to get your vitamins.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wow, I sounded just
like a nurse or something...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It really is too bad that so many
people these days don't like vegetables.
<PAGE>
You look around the festival and this
guy and that guy make terrible faces 
when the vegetables are brought out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Do you eat your vegetables?
You can't just make them and sell them.
Eat them too, to get your vitamins.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wow, I sounded just
like a nurse or something...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that you mention fruits,
I do seem to remember that Tina said 
she likes to eat fruits, I think.
<PAGE>
They are full of healthy vitamins
and so it is no wonder that fruits
are so popular with girls.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The festival grounds
sure do smell sweet and fresh...
<PAGE>
Must be the produce, don't you think?
There are so many sweet things around.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>You should really try not
to overdo it on the smelling though...
<PAGE>
When it is hot outside, smelling too
much sweet in the air is bad for you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They get all of the raw cotton together
and spin cotton that can be used for
a lot of things, I hear.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...
The cotton just comes from the ground.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wow!
Don't look at me like that!
It is just a bad joke you know!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I just wanted to try it out.
Hey, I am the kind of person who
never cracks bad jokes, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>So please don't stare at me like that!
I like it less than when you get angry,
being stared at like that in silence!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They get all of the raw cotton together
and spin cotton that can be used for
a lot of things, I hear.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...
The cotton just comes from the ground.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wow!
Don't look at me like that!
It is just a bad joke you know!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I just wanted to try it out.
Hey, I am the kind of person who
never cracks bad jokes, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>So please don't stare at me like that!
I like it less than when you get angry,
being stared at like that in silence!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All of the other sections are
alright in my book but this is the
one that has my favorite things in it.
<PAGE>
Lotus root, soy, wheat and horseradish.
Especially horseradish. I love that hot 
spicy feeling you get when you eat it!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it really true that when you harvest
fruit you do it by shaking the trees?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>That is really...
I don't know, acrobatic work...
Not something a book worm could do well.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I don't think it's bad.
It is just different from how I imagined
it would be is all.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on winning.
But I think that for you, <MYNAME>,
the beginner's class is far too easy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I say you should try the intermediate
or even the advanced class next time.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on winning.
I expect as much from a friend of Amir.
<PAGE>
I know that Amir
was very happy to see you win, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, my most heartfelt congratulations.
Your produce was truly amazing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations on your victory,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Seeing your produce, <MYNAME>,
made me feel very happy.
<PAGE>
You have a very unusual and special 
gift, <MYNAME>. Being able to make 
people happy is no small thing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Congratulations on your win. I was
very pleased to be able to try your
produce this time <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know, perhaps next time I will put
some tea on for you, <MYNAME>,
as a special reward.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You are the only person I
would put tea on for, aside from
Amir of course.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>
Congratulations.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I saw Amir when you won, <MYNAME>.
It was just like he had won the
